text:
Finally, the government conceded the demand, setting aside the question hour.

Replying to the two-and-a-half-hour debate on the recent vandalism at the university and the death of a person on the Osmania University campus here, the Chief Minister assured the House that he would order a probe by a senior officer into the alleged police excesses against students and faculty of the University of Hyderabad.

Earlier, Home Minister Nayini Narasimha Reddy said research scholar Rohith Vemula whose suicide at the University of Hyderabad on January 17 triggered unrest on the campus was not a Dalit. He belonged to the ‘Waddera’ community listed among the backward classes.

The Chief Minister, however, said the police were verifying the caste of Rohith with the Andhra Pradesh government as he hailed from Guntur.
title: KCR to take up recall of V-C with PM
